pr_title: Exclude internal agent threads from exception profiling

timeline.message: Exclude internal agent threads from exception profiling

timeline.bodyText: what do people think about using == here instead of equals?
timeline.author: mcculls

replies.bodyText: I doubt it would make any difference after inlining given that reference equality is the first check in equals(), but would make a small improvement in bytecode size. I wouldn't bother.
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.message: Add flag to exclude agent threads from profiling (default: true)

timeline.bodyText: I think this should have been dd-trace-java since this is used by dd-trace-ot as well.
timeline.author: tylerbenson
